TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 XML 数字签名或 XML 加密 元素。

span.span: Represents an XML digital signature or XML encryption element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示在 XML 数字签名和加密的密钥信息。The class represents key information in XML digital signing and encryption. 类，可以嵌入专门用于帮助标识所必需的验证或解密 XML 文档密钥的密钥相关信息。The class enables you to imbed key-related information intended to help identify the key necessary for validating or decrypting the XML document. 多个类型的密钥相关的信息可以包含在单个; 每种类型的密钥相关的信息具有关联的类派生自。Multiple types of key-related information can be included within a single ; each type of key-related information has an associated class derived from . 有关详细信息``元素，请参阅[XMLDSIG 规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)或[XML 加密规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/)，哪些是 W3C 网站上提供。For more information about the `` element, see the [XMLDSIG specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/) or the [XML encryption specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/), which are available on the W3C website. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用时签名由统一资源标识符 (URI) 表示的资源对象。The following code example uses the object when signing a resource represented by a Universal Resource Identifier (URI). 此示例中将签名保存在一个新的文件。This example saves the signature in a new file. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CPP/xmldsigdetach.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CS/xmldsigdetach.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/VB/xmldsigdetach.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用时对 XML 文档的签名对象。The following code example uses the object when signing an XML document. 此示例中将签名保存在一个新的文件。This example saves the signature in a new file. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用时加密 XML 文档对象。The following code example uses the object when encrypting an XML document. 此示例将嵌入到加密的密钥加密的 XML 文档。This example embeds an encrypted key within the encrypted XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用时加密 XML 文档对象。The following code example uses the object when encrypting an XML document. 此示例将名称映射到对称密钥以将其标识为解密方法。This example maps a name to a symmetric key to identify it to the decryption method. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/VB/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 返回 对象中 对象的枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator of the objects in the object.

returns.span: 可用于循环访问集合的 的子元素的枚举器。

span.span: An enumerator of the subelements of that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 来自同一集合同时在两个枚举器都不一定需要返回同一个迭代。Two enumerators taken from the same collection at the same time are not necessarily required to return the same iteration. 最初，枚举器必须定位在集合的第一个元素之前，必须由调用方使用之前实现的高级。Initially, the enumerator must be positioned before the first element of the collection and must be advanced by the caller of the implementation before use.
